00001 from molDynamics.gulp.forcefields.TwoAtomPotential import TwoAtomPotential
00002 from os import linesep
00003 
00004 class BuckinghamGulp(TwoAtomPotential):
00005     '''representation of the buckingham potential for gulp'''
00006     
00007     class Inventory(TwoAtomPotential.Inventory):
00008         import pyre.inventory as inv
00009         AFit = inv.str("Fit A", default = None)
00010         AFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00011         AFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00012         rhoFit = inv.bool("Fit rho", default = None)
00013         rhoFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00014         rhoFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00015         CFit = inv.bool("Fit C", default = None)
00016         CFit.meta['tip'] = "whether to change this parameter during a fitting run"
00017         CFit.validator = inv.choice([None,'True','False'])
00018                 
00019     def __init__(self, atom1, atom2):
00020         TwoAtomPotential.__init__(self, atom1, atom2)
00021         self.ii=self.inventory
00022         self.ii.atom1 = atom1
00023         self.ii.atom2 = atom2
00024         # add things to the repository
00025         
00026     def write(self):
00027         return "buckingham "\
00028             + self.writeInterIntra()\
00029             + self.writeBonding()\
00030             + self.writeScaling()\
00031             + linesep\
00032             + self.ii.atom1+' '\
00033             + self.ii.atom1Type+' '\
00034             + self.ii.atom2+' '\
00035             + self.ii.atom2Type+' '\
00036             + str(self.potential["A"])+' '\
00037             + str(self.potential["rho"])+' '\
00038             + str(self.potential["C"])+' '\
00039             + '0.0 ' + str(self.potential["cutoff"])+' '\
00040             + self.getFlag(self.ii.AFit)\
00041             + self.getFlag(self.ii.rhoFit)\
00042             + self.getFlag(self.ii.CFit)\
00043             + linesep
00044
